channel.title: Xilent 639 | Half Spawn | Rev Caves | 24/7 VPS | Tons of Features
channel.description:
[CENTER][img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3208124/XilentAdvertisingBanner.png[/img]
Links Homepage: [url=http://www.xilentrsps.com]www.xilentrsps.com[/url]
We are currently looking for ingame and forum staff
What we are and what we strive to be. At Xilent, not only do we strive to have the best experience, but we also strive to have 100% player satisfaction. We listen to and understand the needs of every single player here at Xilent, so what are you waiting for? Come play now, or read on to find out more about us!
Our Economy. Xilent is a half spawn and half eco ecomony. You can spawn most items such as whips, barrows, furies, etc. But items such as torva, pernix, etc. Are obtained from PvMing or Donating!
How we keep you entertained. At Xilent we try to follow the suggestion of every single one of our players so that we can make our game the best you can be. If you're a skiller, pker, or pvmer, we promise you a 100% optimized experience, or your money back!
Some Features:
*Half Spawn Economy * ::Master *Full Rev Caves *Amazing Combat *Full Chaotic + PvP Armor *Fullscreen *All Nex Armours With Effect *Curses 100% *Quick Prayers *New Runescape Hitsplats *All Dupes Fixed *Many Pk Locations *All Skills Functioning *Dragon Claws 100% *Fast Fluid Client *Perfect Eco *Amazing Stability *Perfect Switching *New Runescape Cursors *Amazing Graphics *Xp Counter *Fun Minigames *Unique Content *Full Member System *Unique Clan Chat System *Many Trainning Locations *A Lot Of Bosses *Staking *Symbol Support *Dicing *Frost Dragons - System *Revenant Cave *Autocasting
And lots more![/CENTER]

item.title: Xilent 639 | Half Spawn | Rev Caves | 24/7 VPS | Tons of Features
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

EverMorePK:

It’s a spawn server…

Then whats the point of having a economy lol pretty dum

Read full topic

[CENTER]

Homepage: www.xilentrsps.com

We are currently looking for ingame and forum staff

What we are and what we strive to be.
At Xilent, not only do we strive to have the best experience, but we also strive to have 100% player satisfaction. We listen to and understand the needs of every single player here at Xilent, so what are you waiting for? Come play now, or read on to find out more about us!

Our Economy.
Xilent is a half spawn and half eco ecomony. You can spawn most items such as whips, barrows, furies, etc. But items such as torva, pernix, etc. Are obtained from PvMing or Donating!

How we keep you entertained.
At Xilent we try to follow the suggestion of every single one of our players so that we can make our game the best you can be. If you’re a skiller, pker, or pvmer, we promise you a 100% optimized experience, or your money back!

Some Features:
